name: WhichWay
description: Determine which direction the target country is from the starting country, 10 rounds daily.

name: Circle Moon Puzzles
description: A collection of fun daily logic games.

name: Pair Down
description: Choose one letter to remove from each word to make new words. The chosen letters should form word(s) as well.

name: Geografind
description: Guess the mystery country in as few guesses as possible, watch the map for hints after each guess.

name: Royal Family
description: Place the chess pieces on the board so that each zone has a piece and no piece can attack another.

name: Freestyle
description: Find 13 words that rhyme with today's word. The more syllables, the better!

name: Stardle
description: Wordle except the secret word is related to Astronomy in some way.

name: trms
description: Restore the vowels in each clue to find answers that reduce to the same consonants. Try the "How to Play"!

name: Curdle
description: Guess the cheese from the zoomed-in photo.

name: WordSmyth
description: Transform the word using one of the clues listed until you reach the secret word.

name: Sudoker
description: Rearrange the cards to create better Poker hands and maximize scores across rows and columns.

name: Wormle
description: Worm your way through the grid to spell today's themed words.

name: Daily Gogen
description: Place the missing letters onto the grid so that the whole list of words can be made.
